db:abstract.db:para: Setting up the macOS environment for Qt.

db:article.db:para: Qt requires Xcode to be installed on the system. You can get it from:

db:section.db:title: Required Compiler Versions
db:section.db:para: Qt for macOS is tested and compatible with several versions of GCC (GNU Compiler Collection) and Clang (as available from Xcode). For a list of tested configurations, refer to the Reference Configuration section of the supported platforms page.

db:section.db:title: OS X on PowerPC hardware
db:section.db:para: Qt 5 does not support OS X on PowerPC.
